data.name: excess item
data.definition: indication that an item is incorrectly present in the data

data.name: number of excess items
data.definition: number of items within the data set or sample that should not have been present

data.name: rate of excess items
data.definition: number of excess items in the data set or sample in relation to the number of items that should have been present

data.name: number of duplicate feature instances
data.definition: total number of exact duplications of feature instances within the data

data.name: missing item
data.definition: indicator that shows a specific item is missing in the data

data.name: number of missing items
data.definition: count of all items that should have been in the data set or sample and are missing

data.name: rate of missing items
data.definition: number of missing items in the data set or sample in relation to the number of items that should have been present

data.name: conceptual schema non-compliance
data.definition: indication that an item is not compliant to the rules of the relevant conceptual schema

data.name: conceptual schema compliance
data.definition: indication that an item complies with the rules of the relevant conceptual schema

data.name: Number of items not compliant with the rules of the conceptual schema
data.definition: count of all items in the data set that are not compliant with the rules of the conceptual schema

data.name: number of invalid overlaps of surfaces
data.definition: total number of erroneous overlaps within the data

data.name: non-compliance rate with respect to the rules of the conceptual schema
data.definition: number of items in the dataset that are not compliant with the rules of the conceptual schema in relation to the total number of these items supposed to be in the dataset

data.name: compliance rate with the rules of the conceptual schema
data.definition: number of items in the data set in compliance with the rules of the conceptual schema in relation to the total number of items supposed to be in the data set

data.name: value domain non-conformance
data.definition: indication of if an item is not in conformance with its value domain

data.name: value domain conformance
data.definition: indication that an item is conforming to its value domain

data.name: number of items not in conformance with their value domain
data.definition: count of all items in the data set that are not in conformance with their value domain

data.name: value domain conformance rate
data.definition: number of items in the data set that are in conformance with their value domain in relation to the total number of items in the data set

data.name: value domain non-conformance rate
data.definition: number of items in the data set that are not in conformance with their value domain in relation to the total number of items

data.name: number of physical structure conflicts
data.definition: count of all items in the data set that are stored in conflict with the physical structure of the data set

data.name: physical structure conflict rate
data.definition: number of items in the data set that are stored in conflict with the physical structure of the data set divided by the total number of items

data.name: number of faulty point-curve connections
data.definition: number of faulty point-curve connections in the dataset

data.name: rate of faulty point-curve connections
data.definition: number of faulty link node connections in relation to the number of link node connections in the universe of discourse

data.name: number of missing connections due to undershoot
data.definition: count of items in the dataset, within the parameter tolerance, that are mismatched due to undershoots

data.name: number of missing connections due to overshoots
data.definition: count of items in the dataset, within the parameter tolerance, that are mismatched due to overshoots

data.name: number of invalid slivers
data.definition: count of all items in the dataset that are invalid sliver surfaces

data.name: number of invalid self-intersect errors
data.definition: count of all items in the data that illegally intersect with themselves

data.name: number of invalid self-overlap errors
data.definition: count of all items in the data that illegally self-overlap

data.name: mean value of positional uncertainties (1D, 2D and 3D)
mean value of positional uncertainties excluding outliers (1D, 2D, 3D)
data.definition: for a set of points where the discrepancy does not exceed a defined threshold, the arithmetical average of discrepancies between their measured positions and what is accepted as the corresponding true positions

data.name: number of positional uncertainties above a given threshold
data.definition:
number of positional discrepancies above a given threshold for a set of positions.
The discrepancies are defined as the distance between a measured position and what is accepted as the corresponding true position.

data.name: rate of positional uncertainties above a given threshold
data.definition:
number of positional discrepancies above a given threshold for a set of positions in relation to the total number of measured positions.
The discrepancies are defined as the distance between a measured position and what is accepted as the corresponding true position.

data.name: covariance matrix
data.definition: symmetrical square matrix with variances of point discrepancies on the main diagonal and covariance between these discrepancies as off-diagonal elements

data.name: linear error probable
data.definition: half length of the interval defined by an upper and a lower limit, in which the true value lies with probability 50 %
data.description:
MDsd1_LE50
MDsd2_LE50r1
MDsd2_LE50r2
MDsd2_LE50r3
MDsd2_LE50r4
MDsd2_LE50r5
MDsd2_LE50r10

data.name: standard linear error
data.definition: half length of the interval defined by an upper and a lower limit, in which the true value lies with probability 68,3 %
data.description:
MDsd1_LE68.3
MDsd2_LE68.3r1
MDsd2_LE68.3r2
MDsd2_LE68.3r3
MDsd2_LE68.3r4
MDsd2_LE68.3r5
MDsd2_LE68.3r10

data.name: linear map accuracy at 90 % significance level
data.definition: half length of the interval defined by an upper and a lower limit, in which the true value lies with probability 90 %
data.description:
MDsd1_LE90
MDsd2_LE90r1
MDsd2_LE90r2
MDsd2_LE90r3
MDsd2_LE90r4
MDsd2_LE90r5
MDsd2_LE90r10

data.definition: half length of the interval defined by an upper and a lower limit, in which the true value lies with probability 95 %
data.description:
MDsd1_LE95
MDsd2_LE95r1
MDsd2_LE95r2

MDsd2_LE95r5
MDsd2_LE95r10

data.name: linear map accuracy at 99 % significance level
data.definition: half length of the interval defined by an upper and a lower limit, in which the true value lies with probability 99 %
data.description:
MDsd1_LE99
MDsd2_LE99r1

MDsd2_LE99r5

data.name: near certainty linear error
data.definition: half length of the interval defined by an upper and a lower limit, in which the true value lies with probability 99,8 %
data.description:
MDsd1_LE99.8
MDsd2_LE99.8r1
MDsd2_LE99.8r2
MDsd2_LE99.8r3
MDsd2_LE99.8r4
MDsd2_LE99.8r5
MDsd2_LE99.8r10

data.name: root mean square error
data.definition: radius of a circle around a given point, in which the true value lies with probability P

data.name: absolute linear error at 90 % significance level of biased vertical data (Alternative 1)
data.definition: absolute vertical accuracy of the data’s coordinates, expressed in terms of linear error at 90 % probability given that a bias is present

data.name: absolute linear error at 90 % significance level of biased vertical data (Alternative 2)
data.definition: absolute vertical accuracy of the data’s coordinates, expressed in terms of linear error at 90 % probability given that a bias is present

data.name: circular standard deviation
data.alias: circular standard error, Helmert’s point error, CSE
data.definition: radius describing a circle, in which the true point location lies with the probability of a normal distribution at 39,4 %

data.name: circular error probable
data.definition: radius describing a circle, in which the true point location lies with the probability of 50 %

data.name: circular error at 90 % significant level
data.definition: radius describing a circle, in which the true point location lies with the probability of 90 %

data.name: circular error at 95 % significance level
data.definition: radius describing a circle, in which the true point location lies with the probability of 95 %

data.name: circular near certainty error
data.definition: radius describing a circle, in which the true point location lies with the probability of 99,8 %

data.name: root mean square error of planimetry
data.definition: radius of a circle around the given point, in which the true value lies with probability P

data.name: absolute circular error at 90 % significance level of biased data
data.definition: absolute horizontal accuracy of the data’s coordinates, expressed in terms of circular error at 90 % probability given that a bias is present

data.name: absolute circular error at 90 % significance level of biased data
data.definition: absolute horizontal accuracy of the data’s coordinates, expressed in terms of circular error at 90 % probability given that a bias is present

data.name: uncertainty ellipse
data.definition: 2D ellipse with the two main axes indicating the direction and magnitude of the highest and the lowest uncertainty of a 2D point

data.name: confidence ellipse
data.definition: D ellipse with the two main axes indicating the direction and magnitude of the highest and the lowest uncertainty of a 2D point

data.name: relative vertical error
data.definition:
evaluation of the random errors of one relief feature to another in the same dataset or on the same map/chart.
It is a function of the random errors in the two elevations with respect to a common vertical datum.

data.name: relative horizontal error
data.definition: evaluation of the random errors in the horizontal position of one feature to another in the same dataset or on the same map/chart

data.name: time accuracy at 68,3 % significance level
data.definition: half length of the interval defined by an upper and a lower limit, in which the true value for the time instance lies with probability 68,3 %
data.description:
MDsd1_LE68.3

data.name: number of incorrectly classified features
data.definition: number of incorrectly classified features

data.name: misclassification rate
data.definition: number of incorrectly classified features relative to the number of features that should be there

data.name: misclassification matrix
data.definition: matrix that indicates the number of items of class (i) classified as class (j)

data.name: relative misclassification matrix
data.definition: matrix that indicates the number of items of class (i ) classified as class (j ) divided by the number of items of class (i )

data.name: kappa coefficient
data.definition: coefficient to quantify the proportion of agreement of assignments to classes by removing misclassifications

data.name: number of incorrect attribute values
data.definition: total number of erroneous attribute values within the relevant part of the dataset

data.name: rate of correct attribute values
data.definition: number of correct attribute values in relation to the total number of attribute values

data.name: rate of incorrect attribute values
data.definition: number of attribute values where incorrect values are assigned in relation to the total number of attribute values

data.name: attribute value uncertainty at 68,3 % significance level
data.definition: half length of the interval defined by an upper and a lower limit, in which the true value for the quantitative attribute lies with probability 68,3 %
data.description:
MDsd1_LE68.3

data.name: data product specification passed
data.definition: indication that all requirements in the referred data product specification are fulfilled

data.name: data product specification fail count
data.definition: number of data product specification requirements that are not fulfilled by the current product/dataset

data.name: data product specification pass count
data.definition: number of the data product specification requirements that are fulfilled by the current product/dataset

data.name: data product specification fail rate
data.definition: number of the data product specification requirements that are not fulfilled by the current product/dataset in relation to the total number of data product specification requirements

data.name: data product specification pass rate
data.definition: number of the data product specification requirements that are fulfilled by the current product/dataset in relation to the total number of data product specification requirements

data.name: physical structure conflicts
data.definition: indication that items are stored in conflict with the physical structure of the dataset

data.name: bias of positions (1D, 2D and 3D)
data.definition: bias of the positions for a set of positions where the positional uncertainties are defined as the deviation between a measured position and what is accepted as the corresponding true position

data.name: chronological disorder
data.definition: indication that events is incorrectly ordered against the other events

data.name: rate of geometric inconsistency
data.definition: rate of items in a common area representing the same real world object with different coordinates in two different datasets according to a tolerance

data.name: count of geometric fidelity failure
data.definition: Number of differences between registered geometry in the dataset and the actual geometry of the real world object

data.name: rate of geometric fidelity failure
data.definition: error rate of difference between registered geometry in the dataset and the actual geometry of the real world object

data.name: Complete tessellation
data.definition: Total number of erroneous polygons within the data

data.name: user defined maintenance frequency
data.definition: evaluation of acceptance quality limit, AQL for user defined maintenance frequency from a feature has changed in the real world until it is updated in the database

data.name: maintenance frequency
data.definition: evaluation if a dataset is maintained as set by maintenance frequency

data.name: currentness
data.definition: degree to which data has attributes that are of the right age in a specific context of use [25012:2008]

data.name: rate of omission for spatial coverage
data.definition: percentage of reference feature geometry where data is absent

data.name: rate of spatial discontinuity
data.definition: the quantity of spatially discontinuous data in relation to the total quantity of data

data.name: rate of omission for temporal coverage
data.definition: the temporal duration without data in relation to the total temporal duration in which data is supposed to be present

data.name: rate of imperfect coverage
data.definition: the percentage of data that fails to provide full coverage due to certain quality issues

data.name: rate of omission for metadata
data.definition: the quantity of missing metadata in relation to the total quantity of metadata that are supposed to be present

data.name: rate of occurrence of sensitive information
data.definition: the percentage of data where sensitive information is present
